title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Whisk eggs and parmesan together in a bowl.
Drain the spaghetti and mix it with the bacon.
Take the pan off the heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture, letting the heat of the pasta cook the eggs.
Season with black pepper and serve.
